title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1240.1 - State Energy Conservation Construction Code
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1240.1 - State Energy Conservation Construction Code

State Regulations

This Part and the publications incorporated by reference in
this Part constitute the

State Energy Conservation Construction

Code
(the Energy Code) promulgated pursuant to article 11 of the

Energy Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1240.1

York State Register February 12, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 06, eff. 5/12/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
